title: How to Find Latias in Pokémon Emerald

steps.title: Have your Pokémon have a move that would put a status effect.
steps.content: Have your Pokémon have a move that would put a status effect. Avoid burning and poison. Sleeping works best.

steps.title: Have a Pokémon that prevents Pokémon from escaping.
steps.content: Have a Pokémon that prevents Pokémon from escaping. A good choice is a Pokémon with the move mean look.

steps.title: Have lots of Great, Ultra, and Timer balls.
steps.content: Have lots of Great, Ultra, and Timer balls.

steps.title: Defeat the Elite 4 and become a champion.
steps.content: Defeat the Elite 4 and become a champion. [1] X Research source

steps.title: You will wake up back at your home after the credits.
steps.content: You will wake up back at your home after the credits.

steps.title: Go downstairs to find your mom and dad.
steps.content: Go downstairs to find your mom and dad.

steps.title: Your dad will give you a ticket and he will go away.
steps.content: Your dad will give you a ticket and he will go away.

steps.title: Talk to your mom.
steps.content: Talk to your mom. She will talk about a program on TV and ask which color you like better, red or blue. If you pick red, you unlock Latias. If you pick blue, you unlock Latios.

steps.title: Once you have picked your color, Latios or Latias will be roaming throughout the Hoenn region in any random patch of grass.
steps.content: Once you have picked your color, Latios or Latias will be roaming throughout the Hoenn region in any random patch of grass.

steps.title: Get a Pokémon that is level 40 in your team and put it at the front of your party.
steps.content: Get a Pokémon that is level 40 in your team and put it at the front of your party. Make sure to have a lot Max Repels. This will make it easier to catch Latias/Latios since the only Pokémon you'll encounter while using a Max Repel has to be at a level equal or higher than your first Pokémon.

steps.title: Go to a location that has a grass and is nearby a door.
steps.content: Go to a location that has a grass and is nearby a door. Use the Max Repels and run in the grass. After around 20 seconds, run into the door and back out. Keep doing this until you encounter whichever one you chose.
